alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Crazy Mountains; Golden Valley; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Thunderstorm winds will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, southern Wheatland, Golden Valley, Sweet Grass and northwestern Park Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking high based thunderstorms across Park and northern Sweet Grass counties, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Big Timber, Clyde Park, Ryegate, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Lavina, Springdale, Franklin, Reed Point, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Shawmut, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Molt, Mc Leod, Pine Creek, Melville, Greycliff, Wilsall and Rapelje. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
